mapper.insert: insert into board(skillnum , userid, boarddate,isdeleted) values('S700',#{userId},now(),0)

select IFNULL(max(boardnum), 0) from board where skillnum ='S700'
insert into upload(boardnum , skillnum , projectnum , uploadalias ,uploadorigin) values(#{boardNum},'S700',#{projectNum},#{uploadAlias},#{uploadOrigin})
mapper.select: select m.username,m.userprofile ,u.uploadorigin ,u.uploadalias ,u.boardnum from board b ,upload u,user m WHERE b.boardnum = u.boardnum and b.userid= m.userid and b.SKILLNUM ='S700' and b.isdeleted = 0 and u.projectnum = #{projectNum} order by b.boarddate DESC
mapper.delete: delete from upload where boardnum = #{boardNum} and skillnum ='S700' and projectnum = #{projectNum}
